evidence.claim: The Missouri Veterans Commission utilizes AWS cloud infrastructure.
The Commission adheres to HIPAA standards for health information.
Evidence of using FHIR standards for health data exchange.
HL7 messaging standards are referenced in healthcare interoperability documentation.
The use of EDI for processing transactions is indicated in operational guidelines.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or EDI use cases in healthcare exchanges on official site.
